mapper.select: SELECT oi.order_id, oi.order_num, oi.order_time, oi.attractions_id, oi.order_date, oi.user_id, oi.order_total, oi.order_status, ai.attractions_name, su.user_name, su.user_avatar FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN attractions_info ai ON oi.attractions_id = ai.attractions_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON oi.user_id = su.user_id WHERE oi.delete_flag = 0 AND oi.order_id = #{orderId}
